title: ERA : the Educational Reform Association School (TEFC)
brief_description: This film gives an impression of the philosophies, day-to-day experiences and development of pupils at the Education Reform Association School at Donvale, Victoria. Students and staff together discuss the aims of the school programme, hopefully providing evidence for greater freedom in all our educational institutions
